description: Numerators of continued fraction convergents to sqrt(727).
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..200
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (0,0,0,1456,0,0,0,-1).
mathematica: Numerator[Convergents[Sqrt[727], 30]] (* or *) CoefficientList[Series[(26 + 27 x + 701 x^2 + 728 x^3 + 701 x^4 - 27 x^5 + 26 x^6 - x^7)/(1 - 1456 x^4 + x^8), {x, 0, 30}], x] (* _Vincenzo Librandi_, Nov 23 2013 *)
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
